LinesAnswers.name: babkaInitial
LinesAnswers.line: Hey, kid, why are you so lost? Ah, never mind, please, help an old woman to put her bags under the bed. I'm 89 years old now, I'm a very old grandmother, my back can't bend at all, and if I bend, I can't sit for half a day - I stand like a soldier at attention.

responses.response: Okay, dear woman, let me help you ... (Push the bag under the bed)
Um, I don't know, I'll have to think about it, maybe later.

LinesAnswers.name: babkaWantsToGiveVodka
LinesAnswers.line: Thank you, honey, you helped Grandma. And wait a minute, I have something for you, a drink from my grandfather, just don't overuse it.

responses.response: Wow, thanks, Grandma. The thing seems to be very strong, it smells even when closed. I don't know what to do with it yet, but it might be useful.

LinesAnswers.name: babkeDuet
LinesAnswers.line: I go to Omsk myself, to see my nephew. He has become quite big - he is a famous athlete, he wrestles with his hands, I don't remember what this miracle sport is called. And do you know why? It is because he used to eat his aunt's jam and pickles when he was little. Well, I won't distract you, young man... The wind in the carriage is so strong... it's terrible, grandma can't sleep...
